com.example.lab_net

Class QRManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.lab_net.QRManager

  • public class QRManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class which holds various utility methods related to generation of QR codes.
    Author:
    Marcus

    • Method Detail

      • toQRString

        public static java.lang.String toQRString(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
        Converts a List of strings into a QR code string.
        Parameters:
        list - The list of strings to convert
        Returns:
        The non null QR version of the list.

      • printQRFromString

        public static void printQRFromString(androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity parent,
                                     java.lang.String qr)
        Attempts to generate and then prompts to print a new QR code from the specified activity. This method may silently fail if the generated QR is invalid. If you must know of failures, use generateQRFromString() and then printQRFromBitmap().
        Parameters:
        parent - The calling activity
        qr - The string to write into the QR

      • printQRFromBitmap

        public static void printQRFromBitmap(androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity parent,
                                     android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Prints the specified QR code from a bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        parent - The AppCompatActivity that wants to print
        bitmap - The bitmap to print

      • generateQRFromString

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap generateQRFromString(java.lang.String qr)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Generates a Bitmap from the specified String as a QR code image.
        Parameters:
        qr - The String to encode into the QR code
        Returns:
        The Bitmap representing the QR code.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
